org.appspot.apprtc

Class AppRTCAudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.appspot.apprtc.AppRTCAudioManager

  • public class AppRTCAudioManager
extends java.lang.Object
    AppRTCAudioManager manages all audio related parts of the AppRTC demo.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AppRTCAudioManager.AudioDevice
      AudioDevice is the names of possible audio devices that we currently support.

      Selected audio device change event.

    • Method Detail

      • onProximitySensorChangedState

        private void onProximitySensorChangedState()
        This method is called when the proximity sensor reports a state change, e.g. from "NEAR to FAR" or from "FAR to NEAR".

      • hasWiredHeadset

        @Deprecated
private boolean hasWiredHeadset()
        Deprecated. 
        Checks whether a wired headset is connected or not. This is not a valid indication that audio playback is actually over the wired headset as audio routing depends on other conditions. We only use it as an early indicator (during initialization) of an attached wired headset.

      • updateAudioDeviceState

        public void updateAudioDeviceState()
        Updates list of possible audio devices and make new device selection. TODO(henrika): add unit test to verify all state transitions.
